Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Spirit Temple# is on the way of the hero.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: I bet you'd like to have more bombs.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #a Small Key# can be found at #Goron City#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #the Fire Arrows# can be found at #Zora's Fountain#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that those who seek #sunken silver rupees# will find #a Piece of Heart#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Boss Key#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that the #Skull Mask# yields #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that plundering #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is a foolish choice.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that the final prize of #the thieves' training# is #a Slingshot#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that the #Skull Kid# grants #a Piece of Heart#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides #Saria's House#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Fire Temple# hoards #a Recovery Heart#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #a Purple Rupee#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that all the Zora drowned in Wind Waker.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides the #Fishing Pond#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Market# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #a Strength Upgrade# can be found at #the Lost Woods#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that the #frozen cavern# echoes with #the Sun's Song#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #a Deku Stick# can be found at #Hyrule Field#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers the #Market Bazaar#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #a Red Rupee# can be found at #Gerudo Valley#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs the #Lakeside Laboratory#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the way of the hero.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #Spirit Temple# hoards #the Stone of Agony#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that a #cow in Gerudo Valley# gifts #the Light Arrows#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #Bottom of the Well# hoards #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Small Key#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Wallet#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #a Hookshot# can be found at #Death Mountain Trail#.

ZF (Fairy).text: Dear @, please come to the castle. I've baked a cake for you.&Yours truly, princess Zelda.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #a Small Key# can be found at #Kokiri Forest#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #Spirit Temple# hoards #a Piece of Heart#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Spirit Temple# is on the way of the hero.
